title: Disabled people in Sweden 2018 , by disability type
summary: The statistic shows the Number of disabled people in Sweden 2018 .
In 2018 , there was a Mental_retardation_autism_or_pervasive_developmental_disorders Number of approximately 65191 million people disabled in Sweden .

people registrations in Sweden case you have ever asked yourself one of these questions : ‘ How many cars are there in Sweden ? ' or ‘ How many disabled vehicles are there in Sweden ? ' , we can tell you as much : In , there were 14.5 million people disabled in Sweden .

data.Disability Type: Mental retardation autism or pervasive developmental disorders

gold: This statistic shows the number of disabled people in Sweden in 2018 , by type of disability accordingly to the Swedish LSS law . That year , there were over 65 thousand people with intellectual disabilities like e.g . autism in Sweden .
